value.0: Good <quarterday> to you, <FullName>.
Your father has asked that you come speak with him immediately, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>. Please enter the Council Chamber and report to the Magistrate at once.

Your father is currently in counsel with foreign visitors, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>. His business should not take too long, but the Council Chamber is closed for the time being. I'm sure he shall send for you when he is free.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Imperial District of Ghaarak guarding the Imperial Grand Hall Doors >>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_PRELUDE" >>
The doors to the Imperial Treasury have been sealed and shut, <Sir/Madam> <FullName>, on orders from your father. No one is allowed inside.
Good <quarterday> to you, <Sir/Madam> <FullName>, and may Rakha keep you in his grace.
Well, I haven't been told exactly, but rumor holds the Imperial army uncovered some sort of ancient artifact during their last campaign against the barbarians of the north.
I'm really not sure, <Sir/Madam> <FullName>, and it is not my station to ask such questions. I have merely been given my orders.
Evidently, he hasn't told much of anyone about it. Even the Imperial sorcerers have been barred from the Imperial Treasury. It's all quite strange indeed.
So Varhun went mad, and tried to kill you, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>? Can't say it surprises me much. He always was a bit unstable... But I think I understand the Magistrate's extra caution now...
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard for the Control Room in Ghaarak's Imperial Grand Hall >>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_PREL_KARA" >>

Good <quarterday> to you, <FullName>. Be wary if you venture in the Market District. It can be a bit unruly at times, and I'd recommend avoiding the darker back alleys. We've had a bit of trouble with some ruffians around here lately.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Market District guarding the Market Doors >>
The docks are closed to all who do not have official business within. Please be on your way.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Market District guarding the Dock Doors >>
Good <quarterday> to you, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>, and welcome to the Imperial Grand Hall.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Imperial District of Ghaarak guarding the Imperial Grand Hall Doors >>
May Rakha guide you and keep you well, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Imperial District of Ghaarak guarding the Imperial Academy Doors >>
Your father entered the Estate grounds a short while ago, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>, and he did not seem himself. I do hope all is well...

Good <quarterday> to you, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>. Your father has sent word that the gates to the Imperial Estate are to remain closed until his arrival. I'm afraid I cannot let you pass at the moment.

I am sorry, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>, but your father's message was quite explicit in this matter. If you wish to speak with your father regarding this issue, I suggest you visit him at the Grand Hall.
I'm afraid not, but I'm sure the Magistrate has his reasons. It is quite unusual for your father to send such an order.
May Rakha be with you, <Sir/Madam> <FirstName>.
<< Activates "N_TALK_SWITCH" if this is the guard in Imperial District of Ghaarak guarding the Estate Doors >>
<< This conversation node does nothing but reset the variable "N_TALK_SWITCH" >>
<< Set owner's journal quest to "JT_PRELUDE" >>
Very well. I'll be on my way then.
That's unusual. Why have the doors been sealed?
What sort of artifact?
Strange... My father hasn't mentioned anything to me of this...
But I must enter my home at once!
Oh very well then!
Did he say why the Estate was to be closed off?
Very well then.
